title: User Authentication and Access Security
summary: Develop a secure multi-factor authentication system with role-based access control.
description: Implement a secure authentication process that requires users to log in using multiple factors such as passwords, OTPs, or biometric verification. Integrate role-based access controls to ensure each user can only access the appropriate features and data based on their authorization level. Include secure session management, password reset functions, and account recovery options to ensure compliance with security and banking regulations. This epic ensures the foundation of trust and data protection for all subsequent portal features.

title: Personalized User Dashboard
summary: Design and implement a dynamic dashboard personalized to the user’s profile and eligibility.
description: Build a personalized dashboard that provides users with an overview of their account details, available banking products, and tailored service suggestions based on eligibility and financial behavior. The layout must be intuitive, responsive across all device types, and designed for quick access to core functionalities. Enable customization of widgets and quick shortcuts to commonly used actions while ensuring a consistent and engaging user experience.

title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Enable self-service workflows for account creation and modifications with support for document uploads and application saving.
description: Develop streamlined workflows that allow customers to apply for new accounts and modify existing banking services through minimal, guided steps. Include secure document upload functionality, the ability to save incomplete applications, and resume capability at a later time. Ensure robust validation and back-end synchronization with core banking systems to handle submissions efficiently. The process should be designed to minimize user effort while maintaining accuracy, transparency, and compliance.

title: Real-Time Notifications and Status Updates
summary: Implement a notification system for real-time tracking and communication of user requests.
description: Create a notification framework that provides users with real-time updates on their submitted requests via in-portal alerts, emails, and optional SMS messages. Notifications should cover all key actions including submissions, approvals, and requests for additional information. Allow users to view their current and past request statuses within the portal under a dedicated status tracking section. Ensure all communications are securely logged to maintain transparency and accountability.

title: Interaction History and Audit Logging
summary: Maintain a secure and comprehensive log of all user interactions with the portal.
description: Develop a complete history and audit logging system that tracks all user actions, including account activity, form submissions, document uploads, and notifications. Ensure data integrity by implementing tamper-proof storage mechanisms. Provide users with accessible summaries of their activity history while ensuring sensitive information is redacted or protected as required. This feature also supports administrators in compliance and audit reporting while maintaining data security standards.

title: Core Banking Integration and Data Architecture
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the existing core banking system while maintaining optimal database performance.
description: Create a robust integration layer that enables seamless and secure communication between the self-service portal and the bank’s core banking platform. Implement APIs for real-time synchronization of account data, service requests, and transactions. Include a dedicated database optimized for portal operations to ensure high performance and scalability. Employ caching, queueing, and transaction monitoring to maintain consistent response times and protect data accuracy across integrated systems.

title: Responsive UI and Accessibility Compliance
summary: Deliver a consistent, responsive, and accessible portal experience across all devices.
description: Design the user interface to be fully responsive and accessible, ensuring consistent usability on desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. Comply with accessibility standards such as WCAG to ensure inclusivity for users with disabilities. Focus on performance optimization, consistent branding, and intuitive layout structures. Conduct cross-platform testing to ensure feature parity and maintain an optimal user experience on all viewports and browsers.
